refnamediv.refpurpose: Modulation (binary vector to RF or IF output)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Code the binary signal using the configured waveform (BPSK, FSK, ...) and then upconvert to IF or RF frequency. If the specified IF frequency is not null, remove also the imaginary part of the signal (output signal is real).

caption.para: Using mod_process to modulate a FSK signal
